document.full_text: despite a ban under martial law imposed last week, protests broke out in bahrain's capital for a planned 'day of rage' but were quickly crushed by security forces.
document.title: bahrain forces quash small protests in 'day of rage'
lines_and_colors: despite a ban under martial law imposed last week, protests broke out in bahrain's capital for a planned 'day of rage' but were quickly crushed by security forces.
